pages.text: Ars: G.E.A.R is an addon to Ars Nouveau that adds in 2 items: The Combat GEAR and  Utility GEAR. $(br2)These are meant to replace the items you’d usually use in a normal Minecraft world as well as the Ars Nouveau Spellbook.

$(bold)Gear modes:$() They have 3 modes, in order to switch between modes you must push the “Cycle Gear” ($(k:ars_gears.cycle_gear)) button.$(br2)If you pick up someone elses GEAR, it will convert into your own GEAR (This includes durability)

$(bold)Repairing:$() You must open the GEAR inventory ($(k:ars_gears.gear_inventory)) and place food in its slots. $(br2) Food quality affects durability given $(br2)($(bold)NOTE:$() saturation and food poisoning doesn't matter)
$(bold)Tiers:$() GEARs have 5 tiers (WOOD, STONE, IRON, DIAMOND and ARCANE). $(br2)Durability, damage, harvest level, and speed increase each tier.
$(bold)Enchanting:$() In order to enchant GEARs you must right-click a scribes table with one in hand.
